Morning Musume。 24's Reina Yokoyama and Honoko Kobayashi of Beyonce's Seasonings present "Halo! Ste.
In the current Hello! Project 2024 Winter 3 of Us, we are performing with the same team.
We have a lot of opportunities to see each other's performances, but, uh, what do you think?
I really love Morning Musume。 Tsubaki Factory has been making new songs and new and wonderful things every time.
I love the performance of Bjorns, and I also love the performance of Tsubaki Factory, so I'm really learning every day.
Although they are the same idols, the three groups have completely different concepts and themes.
I always think it's a lot of fun to discover new things.
This time, we have selected some live videos from the other group's music that we would like to recommend, and we would like to introduce them to you in this order.
Yes! First of all, I, Yokoyama, would like to recommend a song by BEYONES, "Seek Me, Destiny's Traveler"!
I really love this song, but this time I would like to show you a biophonic video.
First of all, I'd like you to look at this moment, but my favorite point is that...

The orchestra is in the back for this concert, so the depth is a little narrower than in a regular concert hall.
Yes, and in this situation, it's dangerous to bump into the back of the car as well.
It's really cool to see how well they can perform together, you know, and you can see that they're doing this formation and that formation, and they're watching their backs.

I was wondering if you had discussed this with everyone.

I used to play alto saxophone and other instruments in orchestras, so I was able to see the formation performances and sounds that are possible only with orchestras,
I learned a lot from the collaboration of an idol and an orchestra, which was really cool.

Morning Musume。 24's Rena Yokoyama and Beyonce Seasonings' Honoka Kobayashi present "Halo! Ste.
It's time for us to say goodbye, and here's an announcement.
Hello Project 2024 Winter 3ofus is now underway!
Morning Musume。 24Beyons is traveling around the country as Team A with Tsubaki Factory
The next one will be at Aichi Park on January 27th, so please come and visit us if you are in the area.
Beyonc will be at Hello Music Festival 2024 in Tokyo on February 4.
We will be performing with Halo Pro trainee unit 2Four.
And the Blu-ray of the Drama Women's Club Beauty Spy Disappearing Attache Case.
It will be released in spring 2024. Please pick up a copy!
And Morning Musume。 23 25th Anniversary Concert Tour
Grad Quarter Century at Nippon Budokan Blu-ray DVD will be released on February 7!
It was a very exciting concert, so I was very excited to be a part of it.
I hope you will take a look at it.
Carbon Neutrality 2024 by Satoyama Satomi Movement will be held at Makuhari Messe on March 30 and 31!
Please come visit us!
Hello! Project is a channel where the members of Hello!
New videos will be uploaded every Wednesday, so please subscribe to our channel!
This time we were joined by Rena Yokoyama of Morning Musume。 24 and Honoka Kobayashi of Nions Seasonings.
